document.full_text: thousands of mexicans on sunday marched into the capital city to protest the wave of killing that has claimed 38,000 lives since president felipe calderon launched his war on drug gangs in late 2006.
document.title: thousands of mexicans march to protest drug war
lines_and_colors: thousands of mexicans on sunday marched into the capital city to protest the wave of killing that has claimed 38,000 lives since president felipe calderon launched his war on drug gangs in late 2006.
